location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Ephraim Gerrish Stannus, Resident in the Persian Gulf, Bushire, to John Wedderburn, Accountant General, Bombay

mods.abstract: Ephraim Gerrish Stannus, Resident in the Persian Gulf, Bushire, informs John Wedderburn, Accountant General, Bombay, that he has forwarded a register of two sets of bills (not included), drawn by Stannus from the Honourable Governor in Council, in order to meet the demands of the Residency.
